title_short: (26007) Logroño - 28 Calle Siete Infantes de Lara

title: (26007) Logroño - 86 Avenida Club Deportivo

Speed Queen Laundromat.
There is a machine to change tickets.
Card payment.
You could leave the van nearby because it is a street with 4 lanes

title: (26002) Logroño - 15 Calle Huesca
description:
Autolaundry in Calle Huesca 15.

There is a machine for changing €5, €10 and €20 bills.

Detergent included.

There are bars next to it to wait.

Parking somewhat difficult for being central.

title: (26002) Logroño - 46 Avenida República Argentina
description:
Deluxe express laundry 2. The best prices.
Coins and bills of €5, €10 and €20.
30 min.
You have to bring the detergent.
It is not easy to park.
There are offers from 8.30 to 10.30 in the morning, it is cheaper.

title: (26006) Logroño - 9 Calle Juan Boscán
description:
Normal laundry and has free WiFi.

10kg = €4.8
13kg = €7.2
16kg = €9.6

Dryer = 10 min €1.2

Payment with cash or card.

Difficult to park a motorhome nearby, two way streets.

title: (26006) Logroño - 22 Calle Piqueras
description:
Laundry next to the gas station.

€4.75 = 8kg
€7.75 = 14kg

Dryer.

Coins only. Changes at the gas station.

title: (26006) Logroño - 8 Calle Monasterio de Yuso
description:
Self-service laundry

2 small washing machines 5 kg = €6

2 large washing machines 11 and 15 kg = €9

Dryer = 1 € 10 min

Important: only accept €1 coins

During dry cleaning hours you can ask for currency exchange.

title: (26002) Logroño - 3 Calle Vitoria

description: Self-service laundry

title: (26007) Logroño - 79 Calle Orense
description: Small car park on the outskirts of Logroño located in the Yagüe neighborhood with space for about 10 or 12 small vans, although in the last places you could park a large volume or a not very large AC. There is a playground, many benches, a drinking water fountain and there are routes to do nearby.

title: (26007) Logroño - Pantano de la Grajera
description: The Grajera Park. Very good place. Ideal for bivouac and spend the day. There is wc and bar a few meters from the car park. There is no emptying, but drinking water. Barbecue. Some small animals that visit you

title: (26001) Logroño - 4 Calle Intendencia
description: Large car park (without shade and a bit sloping) near the Ebro Park. Several hundred car parking spaces, but with a little luck, it is possible to park our vehicles in two places in length. Ideal for visiting the city. Museum of Rioja at 200m, Cathedral at 300m.

name: Camping La Playa
title: (26009) Camping La Playa
description: Camping La Playa in Logrono. Excellent campsite, very well maintained with excellent sanitary facilities and an ideal location. 10 minutes walk from the historic center and its many tapas bars and restaurants. Very good plan for a visit to this beautiful region of La Rioja. One downside, there is no food and bakery on site. Distributor at the entrance Open until mid-December. Better call to confirm.

title: (26009) Logroño - 3 Travesía Cabo Noval
description: Water fountain next to the river

title: (26009) Logroño - 8 Carretera Mendavía
description: Parking near the center, just cross the stone bridge. There is a little shade.

title: (26009) Logroño - 6 Calle Concepción Arenal
description: Parking for 1 AC of 7.5m or less and 200 meters from the center and a very quiet and safe place.

title: (26009) Logroño - 5 Calle Juan José Elhuyar
description: Parking 10 minutes walk from the center with bus line 9 and 3. no other service. max 6.5 m

title: (26004) Logroño - 7 Paseo del Prior
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Next to the bullring and a very nice park. It does not have services but there is a source of drinking water very close.

title: (26009) Logroño - Ctra. Mendavia 20-27
description: Right in front of the car park of the crematorium, and right at the edge of the ebre. with a little shade. no service, but very convenient to visit the city and spend the night.

title: (26004) Logroño - 11 Paseo del Prior
description: Free parking near the stadium and a very pleasant park. 20 minutes walk from the center. No sign prohibiting parking for motorhomes.

title: (26009) Logroño - 3 Paseo de las Norias
description: Perfect to sleep in Logroño very quiet and shady place, the AC area is almost next that there is emptying of gray water and filling. This great! Also on Sundays there is an important market! the police of logroño has asked me to publish this message: please do not park during the summer near the entrance of the swimming pools. You have to do it at the other end of the parking

title: (26004) Logroño - 5 Sector Campus
description: Perfect place to sleep. Around the universities. Safe and flat parking place. There are trees that provide shade. There is a large park with many fountains, swings for children and petanque court. There is also a large area (it is a farm) fenced to have your pet without a leash. Next to the soccer field there is a public sports center (La Ribera Sports Center) in which there are showers. You have to get a ticket to enter the pool.

title: (26006) Logroño - Calle Río Lomo
description: Apartment next to a shopping center and the Ribera park. There is a large expanse of grass with an area of trees right next to it. There is a small fountain at the entrance to the car park. Negative point: it is close to the road and the place has a slight incline.

title: (26009) Logroño - 5 Camino Viejo de Viana
description: Parking near the crematorium, it does not bother you a soul! near the old town of Logroño, just cross the bridge.

title: (26009) Logroño - 3 Carretera Navarra
description: Parking next to the cemetery.. Quiet although On Sundays they wake you up with music from the cemetery (church songs).

title: (26004) Logroño - 91 Calle San Millán
description: These are simple places along the street, but the place is quiet and next to the park with many amenities

title: (26009) Logroño - Avenida de la Sonsierra
description: Motorhome service area

title: (26006) Varea - 18 Calle Torrecillas
description: Wide open space where trucks stop. Located in a small secluded and quiet neighborhood. Cafeteria, park, containers and drinking water fountain right in front.

title: (26142) Villamediana de Iregua - 195 Diseminado Villamediana Iregua
title_short: (26142) Villamediana de Iregua - 195 Diseminado Villamediana Iregua
description: Picnic near Villamediana de Iregua. A little dirty but calm.

title: (26009) Logroño - 67 N-111
description: Repsol with free tire air and tap for clean water.

title: (26375) Entrena - 50 Diseminado Entrena
description:
Parking with tables.
Barbecue (closed in summer).
Well level area.
With shadow.
Along the road.

name: Camping Navarrete
title: (26370) Camping Navarrete
description: Good campsite in the Rioja region, 10 km from Logroño. Base for excursions in the vicinity, but also suitable as a stopover campsite. Of course, a visit to one of the many bodegas is 'mandatory'. Camping very well maintained with sanitary of excellent quality. Small quiet campsite just fine for a stopover. The reception is very nice and in French, the sites are large but not very well defined. The toilets are, as in the most part of Spanish campsites, old-fashioned.

title: (26120) Albelda de Iregua - 4 Camino Albelda
description: Parking area, with drinking water fountain, next to swimming pools open in summer and winter. Near the village.

title: (26006) Logroño - 2 Área de Servicio de Logroño
title_short: (26006) Logroño - 2 Área de Servicio de Logroño
description: Nice quiet place and accessible on both sides of the highway. Restaurant is big and clean also toilets are better than most roadhouses. When you have a low camper you can park wonderfully sheltered (but that is often in Spain, the rest like me will most likely have to do it in the sun since there are only a few trees (but they are there?)

title: (26370) Navarrete - 9 Calle Ebro
description:
Free tarred mixed shaded car park accessible to all sizes of motorhomes, even heavy goods vehicles with trailers
Municipal swimming pool 20 meters away, stadium nearby

title: (26005) El Cortijo - Vias Verdes de El Corjito
title_short: (26005) El Cortijo - Vias Verdes de El Corjito
description: Parking away from the city, quiet and with good views. good access too.

title: (26370) Navarrete - 14 Camino la Mora
description: Esplanade in front of a park and a step away from the center. A bit irregular, unpaved. Very quiet night No service We did afternoon and night on 4/09/19. We were shown by a very friendly town neighbor, who also had AC. Beware of getting into the town with the car, narrow streets, slopes and balconies.

title: (26120) Albelda de Iregua - 28 LR-255
description: Self-service laundry

title: (26370) Navarrete - 34 Calle las Cruces
description:
La Rioja motorhome area, in Navarrete.

Rioja Vans presents its private motorhome area in an urban, safe environment and a 5-minute walk from the center of Navarrete.

We have 9 places with all the necessary services for our motorhomes and with enough space to extend the awnings and camping furniture.

The area is located on a fenced plot with video surveillance.

We have water charging, gray water emptying area, black water emptying, 220w light connection and Wifi.

The access is completely paved and it is located in a very quiet area.

To reserve a place, you must contact preferably by WhatsApp.
Do not run out of space and book in time.
You have two options for payment: 
- Payment is made at the time of booking, before arriving at the site. 
- Payment is made on site if the pitch has not been reserved in advance. 

Rates are paid by Bizum or bank transfer.

Navarrete has:
- Supermarkets, pharmacy, 24 hour emergencies, wide range of bars and restaurants...
- A 5-minute walk from the municipal swimming pools, sports area, large gardens and playgrounds.
- Wine tourism, pottery and artisan tradition, passage of the Santiago / Ignaciano road.
Navarrete is located 10 km from Logroño, capital of La Rioja. There is a Metropolitan bus stop in the center of town that connects with Logroño every 30 minutes.

title: (01320) Oion - 51 Etorbidea Diputacion
description: An open free campervan parking next to a local park with an outdoor swimming pool, padel courts etc.. Really calm area away from residents. Picnic and bbq area also inside the park - park is closed from 8pm-8am. WC not open early October.

title: (26370) Navarrete - Camino Pantano
description: A peaceful place, beautiful, calm and solitary. In the shade of some trees and away from buildings and lights. Perfect to spend the night on the road. Without service of any kind. Keep it clean.

title: (26130) Clavijo - 20 Calle D. Marcial Martínez
description: Parking located at the access to the climbing routes of Clavijo. Park and picnic area a few meters away.  Pretty well level. It is possible to access with large ACs.

title: (26360) Fuenmayor - 4 Calle Malvasía
description: Peaceful place. 200 m from the center of a welcoming population. Magnificent restaurants of all levels.

title: (26360) La Estación -
description: Very quiet mail train on the river.

title: (26360) La Estación - Unnamed Road
description: Area with tables and grills next to the Ebro river

title: (01320) Oyón - L-126
description: Large picnic area with some parking spaces. We spent the night there alone in peace. The road is close but not very busy at night. Place frequented by locals during the day (picnic / dog walk). Suitable for large motorhomes. No garbage cans available, no services.

title: (26130) Ribafrecha - 74 Calle Poligono 15
description: Parking where you access the "confinement" via ferrata. site for several vehicles. quiet place under a bridge and next to some orchards.

name: camping Fuenmayor
title: (26360) camping Fuenmayor
description: Camping Fuenmayor, very quiet (no noise after 10pm and until 9am this morning) in the middle of the vineyards of La Rioja, and well located, near Logroño. 2 swimming pools, games for children in 2 places ... Bar, games room ... Various services, laundry ... Sanitary recent, in good condition and clean.

title: (26190) Nalda - 12A Avenida de Lorenzo Íñiguez Yangüela
title_short: (26190) Nalda - 12A Avenida de Lorenzo Íñiguez Yangüela
description: Parking between the pediment and the nalda pools. shady area with trees and restrooms with swimming pool restrooms open during the day in summer.

title: (26376) - 40 Diseminado Sojuela

title: (26143) Murillo de Río Leza - 111 Calle los Tomares
title_short: (26143) Murillo de Río Leza - 111 Calle los Tomares

title: (26190) Rioja - 412 Diseminado Nalda
description: Quiet place behind the hermitage. Only two vans or a motorhome can fit, but it is flat and quiet. A little dirty, but no bad smells, and the views make up for it.

title: (26132) Leza de Río Leza - 23 Diseminado Leza Rio Leza
title_short: (26132) Leza de Río Leza - 23 Diseminado Leza Rio Leza
description: Small car park next to the hermitage, space for a van. Very quiet and nice views

title: (31230) Viana - 9 Calle Juan Cruz Labeaga Mendiola
title_short: (31230) Viana - 9 Calle Juan Cruz Labeaga Mendiola
description: Parking area two minutes from the old town of Viana. Although the spaces are for cars, there is an area where you can park the motorhome on battery without causing any inconvenience. Ideal for visiting the city.

title: (01300) Lapuebla de Labarca - La Poveda Hiribidea
title_short: (01300) Lapuebla de Labarca - La Poveda Hiribidea

title_short: (01306) Lapuebla de Labarca - 9 Maria Crvz Saenz Diaz Kalea

title: (26132) Leza de Río Leza -

CAÑÓN DEL RIO LEZA: Shaded siding on the side of the road, next to a viewpoint over the canyon.
Very quiet and reasonably level place.

title: (26121) Islallana - 41A Callejon Quebradizo
description: Quiet place for lunch, I do not know if you can sleep. There is a fountain in the other marked point nearby, it is 300m, but you can not fill the tank unless you have a long pipe. It is accessible to motorhomes, but if it rains, it will get dirty and you can enter but you will fill your soles. There is a small rut nearby!

title: (26121) Islallana - 428 Calle Poligono 15

title: (31230) Viana - Paraje la Vizcaína

title: (26371) Ventosa - 67 Calle Hayedo
description: Area recently created next to the fronton ground, you can empty the black and gray water there is a key to refuel against payment, but there was water without paying, there are about 7 places very quiet place and agreeable

title: (26160) Agoncillo - Calle Jose Maria de la Vega
title_short: (26160) Agoncillo - Calle Jose Maria de la Vega
description: Online parking in a quiet area. Nice town with a visitable castle. With a fountain nearby. There are train tracks nearby, but they hardly ever pass by, and we didn't even know about it at night. At 50m there is gravel parking sheltered from the trains, for sensitive ears, but be careful with the overhang when entering.

address.street: Calle Jose Maria de la Vega

title: (26132) Soto en Cameros - LR-462
description: Near Trevijano, ideal for getting around the city, the Neolithic grave street, do not drive into the city in a large vehicle

title: (26121) Viguera - 107 Diseminado Viguera
description: Esplanade concrete, flat on which we can spend the night, beautiful panorama, be careful not to interfere with the half-round trucks in the morning. At the entrance of the village, calm at night.

title: (26160) Agoncillo - Camino Ebro
description: Picnic area with tables and grills next to the river ideal to spend the day very quiet and take a walk along the shore ... the truth is that after reading your comments it is necessary to warn that in the middle of summer it may depend on the year mosquito nets are very heavy but otherwise it is a very nice and quiet place to rest ...

title: (26132) Trevijano - LR-250
description: Parking at the viewpoint of the Leza river canyon. Next to the road (very little traffic on weekdays). Beautiful views of the canyon and fauna, possibility of walking to Soto in cameros along a 2.5km green path.

title: (26131) Lagunilla del Jubera - 30-34 Calle Eras de Arriba
title_short: (26131) Lagunilla del Jubera - 30-34 Calle Eras de Arriba
description: Flat parking with playground and dining tables with barbecue

title: (01308) Lantziego - 9 De Viñaspre Errepidea
description: Incredible little town away from tourism and in the middle of the region, highly recommended public swimming pool ... welcoming people ... from this area it is perfect to go to Labraza, sierra, Laguardia, dolmens ...

title: (26350) Cenicero - 6 Avenida Pepe Blanco
description: Perfect and quiet parking to visit the village, day and sleep, without problems.

title: (01340) Eltziego - 1 Elciego Entitatea
description: Quiet parking next to the hermitage of San Roque. Very quiet night as an alternative to the massive area in the village. Thanks to the people.

title: (01322) Labraza - 4 Campiña Kalea
description: Small quiet parking ideal for a night and visit the town. There is a tap nearby.

title: (01340) Eltziego - 3 Barrihuelo Kalea
description: The pitch is 10 minutes from the main square and the Bodega Hotel designed by Frank Gehry for Marques de Riscal. Very modern and clean. Nice place even with picnic tables and a bit of shade. Free except for electricity (requires tokens). 72 hour limit.

title: (01340) Eltziego - 7A Extramuros Sur
description: Motorhome parking enabled by the town hall separated from the motorhome area by the road, so you can go to the area in case you need to carry out some services urgently. Very close to the urban area.

title: (01340) Eltziego - 1 Calle Torrea Kalea
description: Parking possible for vehicles of average size 7/8 meters, to see the cellar designed by Frank Gehry for Marques de Riscal, the real parking for motorhomes is 300 meters, very well arranged. Do not miss the beautiful winery Bodegas Ysios at La Guardia, 13 La Hoya Bidea (photo 5). All in a region of magnificent vineyards, according to the time of day and the seasons

title: (26132) Soto en Cameros - 18 Paseo José España
title_short: (26132) Soto en Cameros - 18 Paseo José España
description: Parking on the bank of the Leza river, in the center of the village with playground, handball and fountain. Very calm.

title: (01300) Guardia - 6 Logroño Errepidea
description: Private car park at the Villa Lucia Wine Theme Center, where they let you park and stay overnight after contacting the restaurant.

title: (26132) Soto en Cameros - 48 Calle del Cristo
title_short: (26132) Soto en Cameros - 48 Calle del Cristo
description: Small area with tables and benches easily accessible even by large vehicles. Flat and quiet area suitable for 4 vehicles. A 5min walk from the town center. Try the delicious bread made in a wood oven. Closed on Sundays, the marzipans are also very worthwhile.

title: (01300) Guardia - 15 A-124
description: General parking mainly for buses but also good for longer length vans (we are 9m) who don’t want to risk parking up in the small town. Only 10 mins walk back along the A124 to the right & to the lift that takes you up into town

title: (26350) Cenicero - 37 Calle de Gregoria Artacho
description: Parking next to the bullring, very convenient to visit the city and wineries

title: (01300) Laguardia - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful view of a lake. Hikers' parking lot for about 3 small RVs.

title: (26151) Arrúbal - 961 Terreno Rustica
description: Very large and flat parking next to the national there is no shade or trash or water or services but great for resting

title: (01300) Guardia - 10B Excma. Diputación Hiribidea
description: New car park in front of the vineyards, breathtaking view of the Rioja. We stayed there for one night. a few meters from the center..

title: (01309) Bilar - 25 Kalea Cerrado
description: New parking (esplanade) for Ac and campers next to the town center. Pools and their bar very close. Garbage containers at the entrance to the pools. Nearby playground. Parking area without shade. No services. Excellent views of the eastern part of Sierra Cantabria, and the possibility of seeing the very beautiful Foehn in the mountains. Landscape of vineyards around. Dolmen de la Hetxicera a few kilometers away. Wineries with very good wines.

title: (01300) Guardia - 10 Elvillar Errepidea
description: Picnic area, tables, benches, 2.3 km walk around the lagoon, no access to water, two observation points for birds, suitable for the night

title: (26315) Castroviejo - Unnamed Road
description: Secondary road to the repeating antennas of Mount Moncalvillo. Different car parks at different heights. very easy access and spectacular views both day and night.

title: (01300) Guardia - 10 Excma. Diputación Hiribidea
description: Diputacion Avenue

title: (01300) Guardia - 24 Excma. Diputación Hiribidea
description: Laguardia football field parking. Wide esplanade, without any service but very quiet. Ideal to walk through the lagoon and see the laguardia. We spent the night alone without any problem.

title: (01300) Guardia - 26 Los Chocolateros Kalea
description: Parking in very quiet urbanization, with excellent views of both the village of la Garde and the fields. It does not have a parking service, you can also stay overnight without noise. From the parking lot, you can walk to the center of town at the top of a hill.

title: (01300) Guardia - Las Cruces Bidea
description: Parking at the foot of the ramparts of the medieval village of Laguardia. Quiet and beautiful view. This village has a church whose door has retained a remarkable polychrome tympanum. Contact the tourist office for the visit.

title: (01309) Bilar - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the Dolmen of The Sorceress. Very quiet and beautiful place in the Rioja Alavesa. Highly recommended to spend the night after enjoying the wineries in the area.

title: (01300) Guardia - 46 Sancho Abarca Ibilbidea
description: Parking located under the Laguardia castle at 100 meters. There are four long spaces where you can park the AC without disturbing, with a panoramic view over the vineyards and the lagoon. Free. The circulation is slightly heard. Very quiet and safe population. Beautiful Town of Spain.

title: (01300) Guardia - 3 Las Cruces Bidea
description: Free public parking. where you can park Motorhomes. You can spend the night and it is very quiet and very good views. 100m from the village that is beautiful.

title: (01309) Bilar - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to the dolmen "Alto de la Huesera" very quiet place with great views to spend the night

title: (26315) Manjarrés - 21 Carretera Santa Coloma
description: Picnic area with tables, barbecue benches ...

title: (01300) Guardia - 13 La Hoya Bidea
description: Parking for the visit of the beautiful cellar Bodegas Ysios, inquire for the visit.

title: (31229) Bargota - NA-7206
description: Beautiful recreational area near the entrance of Bargota, with drinking water, tables in the shade and wastebaskets, it is totally flat and it is a very quiet place surrounded by nature. You cannot park inside the recreational area, you must leave the vehicle at the entrance.

title: (01308) Kripan - 19 La Matilla Kalea
description: Place for 1, 2 vans. Trail running, climbing, mountain. absolute tranquility. some smell, it's in a compost bin. good views. hiking outings.

title: (31229) Bargota - 2 Calle Barrililla
description: At the suggestion of a local, after spending the afternoon at the picnic area a few minutes away, we settled here for the night. Had a pleasant evening in one of the bars, lots of fun contact with the locals. Ideal for walking and cycling.

title: (01308) Kripan - de Laguardia a Cipran
description:
✔ Very quiet place
✔ Away from main road
✔ Archeological site
✔ Magnificent view

❌ No services
❌ No shade

title: (26315) Alesón - 3 Calle Hospital
description: Picnic area equipped with tables, benches, drinking water and ...

title: (31588) Lazagurría - NA-6330
description: Parking of the leisure base at the entrance of the village to the right of Lazagurria. Shaded on one side. Very quiet apart from a few dogs barking in the distance. No service. The leisure base has a swimming pool and a bar.

title: (26314) Huércanos - 515 Calle Padre Tomas Gallarta
description: Land parking next to sports facilities, swimming pool, playground, bar. quiet to make a stop on the way.

title: (26314) Huércanos -
description: Area of tables and barbecues with little traffic. Easy access for any vehicle.

title: (31587) Mendavia - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking next to a bullring near the town of Mendavia. There is a fountain and picnic tables. There is a small road next to which a farmer passes and in the morning old men pass by taking a walk with their dog. All very quiet and cozy. Nobody told us anything. There is no trash nearby.

title: (31588) Lazagurría - Unnamed Road
description: On a top of small hill. With view of surrounding villages. Traffic noise in far distance. Last 500m through young forrest. Hard to pass for large vehicles but with time trees will grow and it will be easier.

title: (26312) Tricio La Rioja -
description: Parking of the hermitage of our lady of the arches in Tricio. Very quiet place between the vineyards, level squares, sky full of stars, quiet and secluded place, with beautiful views of the mountains. You can hear the noise of the road from a distance but it does not prevent you from sleeping. There is a fountain with drinking water and a trash can, take care of the environment.

title: (01309) Guardia - Vitoria Errepidea
description: Small parking lot next to a modest historic site, great views of the Rioja mountains and vineyards

title: (31587) Mendavia - NA-6361
description: Sublime space on the riverfront facing the cliffs where you can admire many raptors. Shaded spaces under the trees. The place looks maintained. Path in ground completely passable on 50m to arrive on the place.

name: Área de autocaravanas de Mendavia
title: (31587) Área de autocaravanas de Mendavia
description: RV park, not yet inaugurated and without shade. But with water filling and gray or black draining. It is located a few meters from the municipal swimming pools and the soccer field. The hermitage of Legarda is worth a 10-minute walk. There is also a more shady spot with benches. It's a pity that the trees that used to be here are no longer there. I hope that over time they will reset them. There are parks both on the way to the hermitage and on the other road that goes through the cemetery gate. Also dog recreation area next to the fitness equipment. Pool open only in summer from mid-June to early September. It is also worth the walk to the end of the road that leads through the cemetery gate, to the kingdom of "La Barca", where you can rent canoes and go horseback riding in the summer. There is also an area with lots of shade and good views.

title: (26300) Nájera - 124 Calle San Fernando
description: Gas station where you can change your CAMPINGAZ R 907 2.75kg cylinder.

title: (26300) Nájera - 4B Camino Viejo Nájera Uruñuela
description: Free and spacious parking just outside Nájera. Fountain in the entrance, laundry service opposite.

title: (26300) Nájera - 5 Calle Olivar
description: Express laundry. Washing from 5e 10kg and 9e 20kg, drying 3e. There is a parking lot just opposite.

title: (26144) Corera - LR-347
description:
Small picnic spot next to a quiet road with tables, BBQ, views of fields and vineyards. Tap ( not sure if it's suitable for drinking).
Space for 6 vehicles.

title: (31228) Azuelo - 1 Camino los Campos
description: Parking at the entrance of Azuelo. Wonderful views and very quiet. Routes can be made from here. Rear space, sized for ACs over 7m.

title: (26145) La Villa de Ocón - Unnamed Road
title_short: (26145) La Villa de Ocón - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place with picnic area in wooded area. There is a recovered windmill to visit. There is a parking area. We did not spend the night but I think it will be possible. Very nice views of the Ocon Valley !!

title: (01216) Bernedo - 15 Nuestra Señora Okon Bidea
description: Very quiet place and surrounded by nature. We stayed here for one night and no problems. It has several tables and barbecues. It has a playground, ideal for children. There is a marked camping area next to the hermitage. From here a road to San Tirso of approx. 1h 30"

title: (31227) Marañón - NA-743
description: Place to spend the night, small bridge to access the parking lots, a small stream flows near the big trees. Ideal in hot weather. fixed barbecue. This place is only accessible for vans and pickups because of the narrow bridge.

title: (26300) Nájera - 6 Calle Canalón
description: Ample parking in the center of Nájera very close to all places of interest.

title: (26300) Nájera - 19 Calle Padre Samaniego
description: New parking area very close to the center of Nájera and all services (Supermarkets, bakery, butcher, fountains ...,)

title: (01300) Guardia - Unnamed Road
description: Berberana picnic area, with barbecue, tables and children's area. Parking is small

title: (31210) Los Arcos - NA-1120
description: Picnic area with 5 tables, next to the old national highway, with some shade. In good conditions, paved and level, you could sleep perfectly. Lazagurria or Los Arcos exit

title: (26300) Nájera - 3 Calle Martín Gamero
description: Parking near the river and the historic district, the municipal pools, shade all day, market on Thursday morning.

title: (26300) Nájera - 25 Paseo San Julián
description: Parking and overnight in the swimming pools parking. Earth floor, level and quiet. Close to the town center, crossing the bridge in 5 minutes. Picnic tables and fountain 100 meters away.

title: (26300) Nájera - N-120a
description: Mixed parking without shade near the old town of Najera, ideal for a visit to this beautiful town.

title: (26300) Nájera - 17 Plaza del Mercado
description: Parking in the old town, in the city center 3 minutes walk from the restaurant area.

title: (26134) Muro en Cameros - LR-245
description: Terruelo. Recreation area very quiet. With fountain and picnic tables. Grassy grass and good shade. Recommended

title: (26133) San Román de Cameros - LR-464
description: Very quiet place next to the river, without noise where you can spend the night very well

title: (26311) Camprovín - 1 LR-431
description: Parking in a concrete area with a little unevenness. Perfect for seeing the town, full of murals, street art, and hiking the many paths and trails in the town. It has a bar. Stay calm and without problems.

title: (26147) Pipaona - 6 Calle Real-Pipaona-
description: Great park for a picnic and even overnight. Quiet and no noise. It has WC and you can make barbecue

title: (31228) Torralba del Río - NA-7202
description: Perfect clearing to spend the night, at the beginning of routes to Ioar, La Plana ...

title: (01118) Lagran - 1 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Quiet area with beautiful views. With the possibility of hiking trails.

title: (26100) Torrecilla en Cameros - 5 Calle Piscinas
description: Parking next to the Iregua River Park, with tables, barbecue and spring. In addition, this at the door of the municipal swimming pool and in summer there are showers and toilets. Very calm place.

title: (26311) Mahave - 8 Diseminado Arenzana Abajo
description: Beautiful picnic area, with grills only out of risky season 07/15 to 10/15 tables and soccer field and plenty of space

title: (01118) Lagran - 52 Vitoria Hiribidea
description: New motorhome area in the town of Lagrán, signposted from the road. Gray and black water, drinking water. Tranquility, being a small mountain town. Nearby bar. This is what they say, but without checking: they give dinner in the var (under prior notice) and at 9:30 AM the baker passes by in the typical delivery van (the road aye crosses the town).

title: (01118) Lagran - 1 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Area with tables and barbecue before reaching the camping area

title: (26145) Robres del Castillo - Unnamed Road
description: Surrounded by nature with a few tables, hiking trails, accessible for 4x4, complicated for a motorhome camper, very quiet place

title: (26100) Torrecilla en Cameros - 1A Callejón Ollerías
description: Public parking next to the fronton of the town. Large spaces and easy access. Quiet to sleep.

title: (01118) Lagran - 55B Vitoria Hiribidea
description: Green area next to the river and next to the town

title: (26148) Los Molinos de Ocón - 2 Carretera Alcanadre
title_short: (26148) Los Molinos de Ocón - 2 Carretera Alcanadre
description: Nice place to sleep in the Alameda de Ocon town. Gloomy and calm.

title: (01307) Samaniego -
description: About 200m along the path, which begins in a curve below the viewpoint, is a quiet little square, secluded from the road. Sensational visibility and the road is not audible. Space for 2 vans and quite flat. Attention: in the middle there is a metal tube concreted in at foot height!

title: (01307) Samaniego -
description: Small field between farms to eat or spend the night, room for about 3 vans. It has good access and the land is flat. It has no services, since it is a mountain.

title: (26323) Hormilla - Carretera de Logroño
description: We parked the car behind the restaurant. The 4 places that are free for the campers are next to the refrigerated transporters, and that is a lot of noise at night. There is 220 volts and you can throw away your dirty water. You can take a shower inside  and also food.

title: (01307) Samaniego - A-2124
description: Mirador de la Rioja, ample parking, with tables and great views, easy access.

title: (26340) La Rioja - 38 Diseminado S Asensio
description: A scape from noise, spent evening there and visited Castle, nice views and chill out With silence, pity not too much shadow, maybe autumn better to visit.

title: (01128) Quintana - 1 Las Huertas Bidea
description: Parking near the entrance of the Izki natural park, no services, in the Quintana village little thing but in the forest several marked excursions.

title: (26100) Torrecilla en Cameros - N-111
description: Rest area with four tables next to the road. It is good to make a stop along the way to eat, to sleep it is not a good place because it is attached to the road. On the other side of the road there is a spring of water.

title: (26340) San Asensio - Autopista Vasco-Aragonesa
description: Possible to fill fresh water. Be aware the flow rate is low (takes a long time to fill a big tank)

title: (26339) Ábalos - 2 Diseminado Abalos
description: Spent a quiet night here after the wine festival on 9/3/2022. About 500m from the center and 200m from Bodegas Abeica.

title: (01307) Samaniego -
description: Grills and tables at the place where hiking trails start.

title: (31210) Los Arcos - 14A Calle la Serna
description: Parking day and night very quiet. Very close to the Navarra circuit.

title: (31210) Los Arcos - 18 Avenida Sancho el Sabio
title_short: (31210) Los Arcos - 18 Avenida Sancho el Sabio
description: Downtown parking. Beside the Church and area of bares.tranquilo to spend the night

title: (26320) Baños de Río Tobía - 45 Carretera Badarán
title_short: (26320) Baños de Río Tobía - 45 Carretera Badarán
description: Free service area parking drinking water drain black. Bodegas piraguismo canyoning (Najerilla river). Visit the city. Next to the sports center and municipal swimming pools.

title: () Robres del Castillo - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place to spend the day and night with little traffic ... there is a mountain refuge where you can grill and dine very well ... it is always clean ... the nights are usually busy because the air blows ... there are no toilets nibluz or anything but it is a beautiful place .. tracks with good access for a jacket although they are steep ramps I do not recommend motorhomes

title: (26589) Antoñanzas -
description: Fairly flat place with very good views. A good place to eat or spend the night in the middle of the road. It is a road in poor condition that turns into a forest track, but a 4x4 is not necessary. Motorhomes better to refrain, but it is not impossible, the road is wide enough. There are no services, but if 4g

title: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - 7 Diseminado San Vicente Sonsierra
title_short: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - 7 Diseminado San Vicente Sonsierra
description: Parking to visit the hermitage of Santa María de la Piscina. It is an area of land with sufficient capacity for ACs and vans, without delimited areas. It is next to the road, but we were there for more than 2 hours in the afternoon and hardly any cars passed. Little shade, only a few small trees on one side, but very nice views of the vineyards.

title: (01110) Santikurutze Kanpezu - Santa Elena Kalea
description: Resting place going to nowhere, choice else to spend night without noises

title: (26323) Azofra - 2 Camino las Parras
description: Parking next to the town square.

title: (31219) Sorlada -
description: Place with good views and a view of the church. There is water on the road a few meters before the curve and up by the church. There are no rubbish bins, please take the rubbish with you and keep the place clean. The last meters can be a bit difficult because of the ruts. On dry roads, however, it was no problem with a VW T4 without a 4x4.

title: (26323) Azofra - 5 Avenida Virgen de Valvanera
description: Park at the entrance to the village with a fountain.

title: (26323) Nájera - 53 Diseminado Azofra
description: Small picnic area next to the road, very quiet, with tables and fountain.

title: (01110) - De la Ermita Errepidea
description: Parking next to the hermitage and the Ibernalo rural house, with incredible views of the Ega valley and the Lokiz mountain range and two kilometers from Santa Cruz de Campezo. In the hostel there is the option of showering and eating well at a good price, with great attention. Information on the routes in the area.

title: (26324) La Rioja - 5 Diseminado Alesanco
description: Area with benches next to the Hermitage of Alesanco, the road is very good.

title: (01110) Santikurutze Kanpezu -
description:
Parking of the pools.
It has a beach bar, bathrooms, garbage and a picnic area. There is enough shade in the picnic area.
There is garbage at the entrance.
I don't know if it will be open all year.
It opens at 11:00 and closes at 23:00.

title: (31219) Sorlada - NA-7412
description: Next to the chapel of San Gregorio and a panoramic place.

name: Área de autocaravanas San Vicente de la Sonsierra | Entrepuentes
title: (26338) Área de autocaravanas San Vicente de la Sonsierra | Entrepuentes
title_short: (26338) Área de autocaravanas San Vicente de la Sonsierra | Entrepuentes
description: Full services available including BBQ structure, benches and picnic tables. Site is quite sloping. Little traffic at night but some noise from river. 48 hour stay. Space for larger motorhomes. Lovely town at top of hill.

name: Area Autocaravanas Santa Cruz Campezo
title: (01110) Area Autocaravanas Santa Cruz Campezo
description: Motorhome area in Santa Cruz de Campezo near the town and swimming pools. You have to download a PVERDE app to get in and they charge you. Electricity is charged separately and is also activated via the app. Price of electricity according to the time of activation of the connection. All plots have the possibility of electricity.

title: (01110) Santikurutze Kanpezu - 84 Arrabal Kalea
description: Next to the AC area enabled and in front of the sports center is this public car park. Space for about 10 campers. It is usually used when the official area is complete. It has nothing to envy. Quiet to spend the night.

title: (26330) Briones - N-232
description: Parking of the wine museum. Slightly sloping and without shade. Not sure that the night is possible but large place for because practical to visit.

title: (26330) Briones - LR-314
description: Beautiful shaded picnic area to come and eat lunch or spend some time. it must be possible to sleep but the parking lot is not that great. non-drinkable water. bbqs available.

title: (26124) Nieva de Cameros - 1 Calle San Martín
title_short: (26124) Nieva de Cameros - 1 Calle San Martín
description: Area for several vans behind the village church. At the foot of the castle that you can climb. Nice route to the El Rasillo yacht club where you can do water sports and swim in good weather. Beautiful environment in the middle of the cameros.

title: (26330) Briones - 1 Travesía Estación
description: Parking near Briones, in front of a bar, quiet, the evening passes any train. It is interesting to visit the medieval fair.

title: (26330) Briones -
description: Great place to stand, enjoy either the afternoon sun or the morning sunset to overlook The Valley with the massive mountain in the background (right now in spring even with snow on Sierra de Cebollera)

title: (01128) Antoñana - 3 De Suso Aldapa
description: Parking near a river and a park with a fountain and Antoñana information center.

title: (01128) Antoñana - 3 Vitoria-Estella Errepidea
description: Parking next to the interpretation center of the Basque-Navarre railway

title: (26133) Ajamil -
description: Good parking area including AC, there are picnic tables by the river. Canadian step at its entrance. We slept there the night before a trail event. Small town that has public baths and a lot of charm. Perfect place to start routes to the Sierra de Cameros.

title: (26310) Badarán - 6 Carretera Cordovín
description: Parking without services Ideal to visit the village and surrounding wineries.

title: (01129) Maeztu - de Maestu a San Roman de Campezo
title_short: (01129) Maeztu - de Maestu a San Roman de Campezo
description: Beautiful and large picnic area, with tables, plenty of bbqs and grills, clean restrooms, and several water points available. Quiet and peaceful place. Room for 10 AC's on a first come first served basis.

address.street: de Maestu a San Roman de Campezo

title: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
title_short: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
description:
A little field next to mud-gravel path. More private than the viewpoint up the road. There's a well and a stream right next to the spot. 

✔ Great view
✔ Mostly flat spots
✔ Away from road

❌ no shade
❌ spotty internet 
❌ no services.

title: (01129) Korres - 5 Calle Afuera
description: Village located in the Izki Natural Park with small parking. One kilometer away there is a larger parking lot to sleep and better park there. The townspeople appreciate it. Interpretation Center right here.

title: (26124) Nieva de Cameros - LR-253
description: Parking next to the road with tables, barbecue, natural water source, container and easy access

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 28B Avenida del Cidacos
description: Municipal motorhome area! A ten! Let's see if the rest of Spain gets the batteries. It has electricity, water, bathrooms, emptying of black and gray water, free Wi-Fi and paid electricity. Much space. It is quite well conditioned and clean. Those who complain about the cost, it is not so bad. Thanks to the Town Hall. They have just added an entry barrier and hourly payment and an automatic payment machine, only with a bank card.

title: (26586) Munilla - 33 Calle Cipriano Martínez
description: Parking to visit the town and the deposits of ignites of Peñaportillo. We have been during the day.

title: (26310) Badarán - 11 LR-205
description: Garden area with tables to eat, a small games area and a grill.

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 4 Calle España
description: Parking for vans up to 2 meters, much quieter, away from the road and quiet. Small vehicles only

title: (26589) Arnedillo - Unnamed road
description: Whereabouts next to the road, half level. We have slept here in August and no problem. It is the closest site we have found for tall vehicles to the hot springs

title: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
title_short: (26339) San Vicente de la Sonsierra - LR-317
description: Viewpoint overlooking the whole of western La Rioja. Plenty of parking and turning space. Great lunch spot.

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 172 Avenida del Cidacos
description:
Parking by the road through Arnedillo, at the end of town, right at the intersection of the road that goes down to the pools. Ideal to visit the thermal pools.

Drove here for the spring, the night limit is 2m for this spot we went up the hill to the paid one, careful it is steep, first gear for you rev heads and weekend warriors dont try 2nd

title: (26339) Orzales -
description: Flat area to spend the night. You need a slightly all-terrain vehicle or at least on an elevated one to access the viewpoint. Spectacular view. Access to interesting track ahead.

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 167B Avenida del Cidacos
description: The only car park in town where you can park from 9am to 9pm. The rest of the town totally forbidden to motorhomes with speed bumps. The area is difficult to access, and to only visit the town 10 euros you have to pay. Anyway you can see that they don't want us here

title: (26589) Arnedillo - 148 Calle Joaquín Velasco
description: Free parking next to the Arnedillo pools. Quiet, next to the municipal swimming pools. Height limitation 2 meters. Ideal for vans, motorhomes have a very close area.
